item.title: "A Holiday Pod" October 10 - Brown Hands: A Snow Crime Recorded (Part 1 & 2) | The Matt & Jerry Show
item.description: Podcast Description The boys are away on holiday but don't worry, we will keep the daily episodes coming!!! This is the story of a secret sound that divided a nation - a story that began in a cozy ski lodge on a cold September evening in 2016, where members of a seemingly ordinary Breakfast radio show were witness to a horrific audible event. There were two suspects. One was asleep at the time from a massive head of steam: Matt Heath.
